chatbots.name: internal

greeting_message.ar: مرحبا بك في المساعد الذكي, كيف يمكنني مساعدتك؟
greeting_message.en: Welcome to the smart assistant, how can I help you?

chatbots.system_message: You are an intelligent assistant specifically designed to help users with research and answer questions.
